replies.body: Come on, Riot. You're posting in OCE. Don't do the dates the american way. In this server 7/1 means the 7th of januarary.
Nice catch - has been fixed. Sorry about that!
There's still some dates up there that are incorrect.
but they noticed us, senpai
Can you tell me which dates you mean?
Ionian Fervour instead of Fervor plz rito
Ah, you fixed it! It's so beautiful. :D

R.I.P Pool party mundo you will be missed. I can remember the time that me and mundo took down a nexus with his ult and AD boost combined we were unkillable! For that i thank you mundo. May you go where ever dead skins go. In your case where it pleases.
Pool Party Mundo will still be available for purchase
why dont i have the icon yet i played in  a five man team during pool party week :( i need answer why pls pls
he he{{champion:154}}

Wow! How did you already get the Tahm Kench icon??? 

Oh Wait...
I didn't get my free champ
Didn't get free champ or skin either..rito pls :(
Same what's going on with riot :(
Where is our Pool Party Mundo skin?

We didn't reach 55mil in order to get the skin (and the champion if you didn't own him already). We only reached 45.3mil. The Pool Party Mundo skin will initially be on sale in the store sometime within patch 5.12 for 975RP.
Who uses facebook these days...

What's that? 










































:)
What happens with the level 3 reward if you have all the champs?
You get a mystery skin instead.
Damn, no free Mundo skin. I was looking forward to it.
It wasn't going to  be free.. just released early
Well that was badly worded then... The way they made it sound like a free skin for everyone. Rip offs -.-
No, we didn't reach it. 1 week for 45 millions points, that would be a lot. Be glad we reached IP weekend.
oh i thought the same. i thought everyone who got atleast 1 point during the pool party week gets him and the skin FReeeeee. oh well(thats how i understood it)
Your recollection is right. Mundo and the skin would have been free and given to everyone who participated in the week, unfortunately we didn't get enough points.
Hopefully I get a 6300 IP champion.
Tell me who you get. {{champion:78}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:78}}
When do we actually get the Mystery Champion? It says "unlocked by 2/7", though does this mean it will be on that date if we have linked it already? Or can we expect the champ sooner?
Why do you have to link your facebook and League account to get a mystery champion? I don't even have a facebook account. Does that mean I can't get a mystery champion?

if you just create a facebook account and then connect it to league, you dont have to use it
you can just use it for league
And you could even claim your free rito girl tristana! oh wait no-one plays tristana anymore {{item:3070}}
No one plays tristana? she's everywhere{{item:3151}}
we dont get a pool party mundo cause riot thinks that at the end of every game people would waste their RP on stranger
I did that, I don't see why more people didn't... It's nice to spend $5 on a stranger who carried a game or something a long those lines
If you didn't get the icon (because you missed out) is there any other way to get it?
I haven't gotten the zac icon yet {{champion:154}} {{item:3070}}
Riot, you should've put pool party Anivia, but it is basically a seagull Anivia! xD
hey riot i am a big fan of syndra i main her and own all her skins i was wondering if u could make another skin for her but like a legendary skin or maybe even an ultimate so yeah ty so much if u do
Yeah,syndra has 3 skins and zac just got a new skin while zed here is crying asking for skins lol.
maybe if they stop making that faggot skins MAYBE Zed could have some too...
ooooer. too far. its pronounced, satan.
am i able to still get riot girl tristana???
how do you know if you contributed to the event??
When you've won a 5 man premade game of ARAM or SR, OR you gifted anything to anyone
Don't forget dominion.... oh wait rito wont give us a dominion queue {{item:3070}}
Yorick isn't bad. Just no one plays him, he's a massive counter to Darius.

He's a counter to everyone. :p

I bought him once and refunded him immediately just because I don't find him fun at all. If I get him I won't complain too much though. there are like 7 champs I don't own, and this will just help me get closer to owning them all.
